general.title: General
general.description: Set your individual preferences for the console experience. Any changes will be autosaved.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Console will appear as per the selected theme.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Configure default authentication credentials for cluster deployments.

pullSecret.label: Pull Secret
pullSecret.configured: Pull secret is configured. Click "Show and edit" below to view or modify.
pullSecret.helpText: A Red Hat account pull secret can be found in

sshKey.label: SSH Public Key
sshKey.configured: SSH public key is configured. Click "Show and edit" below to view or modify.
sshKey.helpText: This SSH key will be used by default for all cluster deployments unless overridden.
